title: Did Congress Use a ‘Slush Fund’ to Pay $17 Million to Women They Sexually Harassed?
subtitle: Although the term "slush fund" signals secret money stashed for illicit purposes, Congress has authorized public money in a fund set aside to pay settlements.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Congress has a "slush fund" from which it has paid $17 million to women who accused members of sexual harassment or abuse.
